done.body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Raiz-Reading-2.png)

__1) Apa itu Raiz?  
__

Raiz adalah satu __aplikasi pelaburan__ mikro. Fungsi utama Raiz adalah membantu anda menyimpan dan melabur duit baki harian anda secara automatik apabila setiap kali anda berbelanja supaya tabungan anda boleh terbina tanpa anda sedari!

Raiz adalah syarikat usahasama antara Raiz Australia Invest Limited dan Permodalan Nasional Berhad (PNB). Raiz merupakakan entiti pasaran modal yang dilesenkan oleh Suruhanjaya Sekuriti Malaysia.

Untuk sebarang info, lawati [www.raiz.com.my](http://www.raiz.com.my) atau hubungi Raiz di [help@raiz.com.my](mailto:help@raiz.com.my) atau 03-27146114, atau laman rasmi media sosial [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/raizmalaysia) kami.

Kini, lebih 300,000 akaun Raiz telah dibuka! Aplikasi Raiz boleh dimuat turun dari app store (Android dan iOS).

__2) Bagaimana kerjasama PPZ-MAIWP x Raiz ini berfungsi?__

Selain fungsi utama menyimpan dan melabur duit baki harian, satu lagi fungsi menariknya ialah __Raiz Rewards__, dimana pengguna Raiz akan mendapat ganjaran bonus tunai setiap kali berbelanja dengan lebih 100 rakan jenama kami (Shopee, Lazada, agoda dan banyak lagi!).

Dengan __kerjasama terkini bersama PPZ-MAIWP__, apabila anda membayar kewajiban __zakat anda melalui Raiz__, anda menerima ganjaran __bonus tunai 1% untuk setiap pembayaran zakat__ tersebut.

Mudah!

__3) Adakah pembayaran zakat ditolak daripada akaun Raiz saya?__

__Tidak.__ Apabila anda membayar zakat melalui Raiz, ianya BUKAN ditolak daripada akaun Raiz anda. Ianya akan ditolak dari kad debit anda.

__4) Bila dan bagimana saya akan mendapat ganjaran bonus tunai 1% daripada Raiz?__

Biasanya anda akan menerima ganjaran bonus tunai daripada kami __sepantas esok hari bekerja__! Bonus tunai ini akan dimasukkan terus ke dalam akaun Raiz anda secara automatik.

(Dalam situasi yang jarang berlaku, ianya mungkin mengambil masa sehingga 5 hari bekerja.)

Anda boleh melihat ganjaran bonus tunai anda di skrin ‚ÄúLepas‚Äù (‚ÄúHistory‚Äù) di dalam aplikasi Raiz anda.

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/zaakt-example-in-app.png)

.

__5) Adakah ganjaran bonus tunai ini akan memberi kesan kepada jumlah bayaran zakat saya?__

__Tidak__. Sebagai contoh, anda bayar Zakat RM100, anda akan menerima resit dari PPZ-MAIWP sejumlah RM100. Pada masa yang sama, anda akan menerima RM1 (iaitu 1%) di dalam akaun Raiz anda.

__6) Dari mana datangnya ganjaran bonus tunai 1% ini?__

Bonus tunai ini adalah adalah __tajaan dari pihak Raiz__, bukan PPZ-MAIWP.

__7) Bila dan bagaimana saya boleh mendapatkan resit pembayaran?__

Anda boleh mendapatkan resit rasmi dan rekod pembayaran daripada portal [zakat2u](https://www.zakat2u.com.my/login?return=/akaun) PPZ-MAIWP dalam masa __3 hari__ setelah pembayaran dibuat. Pastikan anda mempunyai akaun dengan PPZ-MAIWP (anda hanya perlu daftar jika anda belum ada).

done.body:
__[![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Blog-3.png)](https://raiz.com.my/blog/learn-what-is-stock-exchange-bursa-malaysia-mr-diy/)__

Have you ever calculated your current financial position? Where is the best place to start? A common way to understand this is by estimating your net worth.

__What is Net Worth?__

Your net worth is an indication on how well off you are financially. If your assets (things you own) are worth more than your liabilities (things you owe), your net worth is positive, which means you have more than you owe. This is generally considered a good thing. However, if your liabilities are higher than your assets, your net worth is negative, indicating that you owe more than you own.

__Why is your Net Worth important?__

Your net worth helps you in understanding your __current financial situation__ to better plan your finances. It provides a measure of your progress in accumulating financial wealth and the progress you‚Äôre making toward paying off your debt.

By understanding your net worth, you can get a bigger picture of making better financial decisions, tracking your progress, and working towards building long-term wealth and financial security.

__How to calculate your net worth?__

Your net worth is a total of all __your assets minus your liabilities.__ In the below, we will use an example to calculate Ali‚Äôs net worth. Firstly, we will take a look at Ali‚Äôs assets.

__Assets__ ‚Äì when you add up the value of everything you __own__ (such as your house and the cash in your bank account).

Example:

*   Ali has RM10,200 cash in ASB.
*   Ali has a house valued at RM360,000.
*   Ali has a 3-year old Myvi car, and if he were to sell it now, he will get RM20,000.
*   So, Ali‚Äôs total assets are RM390,200.

Next, we will look at Ali‚Äôs liabilities.

__Liabilities__ ‚Äì when you add up the value of all your __debts__ (such as your house loan, car loan or credit card balances).

Example:

*   Ali‚Äôs house still has bank loan balance of RM200,000 to settle.
*   Ali has a 3-year old Myvi car that still has bank loan balance of RM34,000 to settle.
*   Ali has RM2,000 credit card balance.
*   So, Ali‚Äôs total liabilities are RM236,000.

__Net Worth = Assets ‚Äì Liabilities.__

So, Ali‚Äôs __net worth__ is RM390,200 ‚Äì RM236,000 = __+RM154,200__.

Theoretically, your net worth is the cash you would have if you were to sell everything you own and paid off all your debts. A negative net worth is an indication that you have more debts than your assets.

In summary, calculating your net worth is essential because it provides a comprehensive snapshot of your financial standing. By assessing your assets and liabilities, net worth enables you to set meaningful financial goals and make informed decisions about saving, investing, and borrowing. Like market conditions, your net worth will change throughout your life so it‚Äôs important to keep track and reassess if you are still working towards your saving goals.
